name: web-basics
description: basic test driven js/node app for beginners

scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:test
scripts.build:all:watch: npm run clean && npm run build:static && npm run build:scripts -- -w && npm run build:test -- -w
scripts.build:static: cp app/index.html dist/index.html && cp custom-elements-es5-adapter.js dist/custom-elements-es5-adapter.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf test && mkdir dist && mkdir test
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test: npm run test:build && npm run test:server

author: kasperstorgaard
